## HEADER\_CONTENT\_RENDERER\_OPTIONS variable

Token for injecting options for content header renderer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
HEADER_CONTENT_RENDERER_OPTIONS: InjectionToken<VisualPluginOptions<any>>
```
